clinical_study.brief_title: Acute Effects of a Stretching Program of the Rib Cage Muscles on Patients With COPD During Exercise
clinical_study.official_title: Acute Effects of a Stretching Program of the Rib Cage Muscles on the Regional Distribution of Ventilation and the Diaphragmatic Mobility of Patients With COPD During Exercise: a Randomized Crossover Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Investigate the effects of stretching the muscles of the rib cage in individuals with COPD during exercise.

detailed_description.textblock:
To investigate the effects of a stretching program for the muscles of the rib cage or control in patients with COPD during exercise and / or the immediate post-exercise, using the following parameters:
- Tidal volume (VT), respiratory rate (RR), minute volume (MV), inspiratory time (Tins) and expiratory (T exp).
- Change in volumes of total and regional chest magazines (pulmonary rib cage, abdominal rib cage and abdomen).
- Diaphragmatic mobility.
- electrical muscle activity
- endurance time.
- Dyspnea sensation.

primary_outcome.measure: Endurance tolerance as measured by the duration of the exercise
primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of the exercise, an expected average of 10 minutes

primary_outcome.measure: Dyspnea as measured by Borg Escale
primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of the exercise, an expected average of 10 minutes

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of the stretching and the exercise, an expected average of 60 minutes

secondary_outcome.measure: Volumes of the chest wall measured by pletismography optoelectronic
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of the stretching and the exercise, an expected average of 60 minutes

secondary_outcome.measure: Muscle electrical activity measured by surface electromyography
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of the stretching and the exercise, an expected average of 60 minutes

arm_group.description: This group undergo a session of stretching aiming flexibility of the rib cage and later at an exercise test with constant load up to the limit of tolerance for exercise bike

This group will carry out the exercise test with constant load up to the limit of tolerance for exercise bike after a period of rest under the same environmental conditions and the experimental group time. During this time the therapist will place their hands but not performing the stretch.

intervention.description: Stretching of the rib cage muscles
Constant load exercise on a bike
